verses.name: Proverbs 13:7
verses.text: There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:8
verses.text: The ransom of a man’s life are his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:9
verses.text: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:10
verses.text: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:11
verses.text: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.

verses.name: Proverbs 13:12
verses.text: Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life.
